explanation: [0-0] The screen is divided into three parts, with the upper and lower parts blacked out. In the middle part, a man in a gray shirt and black pants, holding a long stick, is standing on a hillside covered with withered grass. Facing him is a wolf staring at him menacingly. The hillside is covered with snow, and in the distance are rolling mountains.
[0-3] The man then waves the long stick, trying to drive the wolf down the hillside. The wolf keeps approaching tentatively but keeps a certain distance from the man.
